page.title: 07EPPLETON YESTERDAY 21.4.1985
page.content: Yesterday was Sunday. At nine o'clock I went to the garden to see if everything was alright. At ten o'clock I went up my gran and grandad Lewins. At eleven o'clock we went to {church}till twelve o'clock. After that I had my dinner. Then I went up to my grandad's garden to do some potting up. Then I had a game of dominoes. After that I watched the football match. Then I had my tea. After that we went back home. Then I went in the bath. Then I watched Gold Finger on {television}and I went to bed after my supper.
